0100100100111100 0111011010101011 1 -> sum: 1011111111101000, cout: 0
1000100111110011 0010110000100101 0 -> sum: 1011011000011000, cout: 0
0101000000010111 1010101000111110 1 -> sum: 1111101001010110, cout: 0
